biography: Georgia Mackenzie is a British actress whose TV credits include roles in Border Cafe, Outlaws, Hot Money, Murphy's Law and Waterloo Road.  Her father Colin Mackenzie, a journalist, is the man who famously tracked down Great Train Robber Ronnie Biggs in Rio. Her grandmother is writer and producer Hazel Adair, who created amongst others TV hits Compact and Crossroads. She was previously married to actor Richard Coyle and they have one child.
name: Georgia Mackenzie
